meanings.meaning: believed to be the home of God

examples: I feel like I've died and gone to heaven.
Our child seemed a gift from heaven.
(figurative) It was a marriage made in heaven.

meanings.meaning: place/situation in which you are very happy

examples: It was sheer heaven being alone at last.
The kids were in absolute heaven at the fair.
The island is truly a heaven on earth.
Building up a tan by the pool with a good book is my idea of heaven.
